sn35.230:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, balisiko amisagatabalisam gambhire udakarahade pakkhipeyya.
sn35.230:1.3: Evanhi so, bhikkhave, maccho gilitabaliso balisikassa anayam apanno byasanam apanno yathakamakaraniyo balisikassa.
sn35.230:2.1: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, chayime balisa lokasmim anayaya sattanam vadhaya paninam.
sn35.230:2.3: Santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.230:2.4: Tance, bhikkhu, abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati.
sn35.230:2.5: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilitabaliso, marassa anayam apanno byasanam apanno yathakamakaraniyo papimato …pe…
sn35.230:3.1: Santi, bhikkhave, manovinneyya dhamma ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.230:3.2: Tance, bhikkhu, abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati.
sn35.230:3.3: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilitabaliso marassa anayam apanno byasanam apanno yathakamakaraniyo papimato.
sn35.230:4.1: Santi ca, bhikkhave, cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.230:4.2: Tance, bhikkhu, nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati. Ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na gilitabaliso marassa abhedi balisam paribhedi balisam na anayam apanno na byasanam apanno na yathakamakaraniyo papimato …pe….
sn35.230:5.2: Santi, bhikkhave, manovinneyya dhamma ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.230:5.3: Tance bhikkhu nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati, ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na gilitabaliso marassa abhedi balisam paribhedi balisam na anayam apanno na byasanam apanno na yathakamakaraniyo papimato”ti.
